titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Lawrence M. Noble, Associate Secretary, Yale University, Records Concerning the Athletic Association
Noble (Lawrence M), Associate Secretary, Yale University, Records Concerning the Athletic Association
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Thursday January 10, 2019 at 11:27

did.unittitle: Lawrence M. Noble, associate secretary, Yale University, records concerning the Athletic Association

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of correspondence, complaints, budget materials, and administrative records documenting committees, coaches, sports, personnel, intercollegiate athletics, investments, real estate, facilities, and legislation concerning athletics at Yale.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. Office of the Secretary

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 4-B (YRG 4-B), Records of Yale deputy, associate, and assistant secretaries.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The records were transferred from the Office of the Secretary, 1982.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Lawrence M. Noble, Associate Secretary, Yale University, Records Concerning the Athletic Association (RU 67). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged alphabetically by subject.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of correspondence, complaints, budget materials, and administrative records documenting committees, coaches, sports, personnel, intercollegiate athletics, investments, real estate, facilities, and legislation concerning athletics at Yale.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to Boxes 2 and 6 are restricted. The remainder of the collection is open for research.

controlaccess.subject: Athletics
College sports

did.unittitle: Records of Lawrence M. Noble concerning the Athletic Association
